name: Alien Cropping
description:
You need to grow and harvest alien crops, which unfortunately shoot at everything around them - including you.

But first you have to kill some aliens to get the seeds. Have fun :)

shoot (LMB) - plant (p) - replay (r) - exploration cam (e)

Created within 72 hours for Ludum Dare 52 - theme was "harvest"

3D-Modeling: Sebastian

Everything else: Caro

Tools: Unity, C#, Blender, Mixamo(animations), FLStudio
